**Kyle Seager Retires from Mariners with Emotional Farewell**

Seattle Mariners catcher Kyle Seager announced his retirement on April 15, 2023, after 13 seasons with the team. Seager, a 37-year-old veteran, finished his career with 1,806 hits, 104 home runs, and 1,008 RBIs, making him one of the most accomplished catchers in MLB history.

Seager's career highlights include his 2014 World Series championship with the Mariners, where he hit a game-winning home run in the decisive Game 7. He also led the league in on-base percentage in 2018 and was named an All-Star in 2019. Seager's career was marked by his exceptional fielding and clutch hitting, earning him the nickname "The King of the Catch."

On the day of his retirement, Seager addressed the team and the fans, expressing his gratitude for the opportunity to play for the Mariners. "I want to thank the Mariners organization for giving me the chance to play here and for the memories we've made together," he said. "It's been an incredible journey, and I'll always cherish the time I spent with my teammates and the fans."

The emotional farewell was a testament to Seager's impact on the team. His teammates, including star players like Robinson Cano and Felix Hernandez, were in tears as they watched him walk off the field. "Kyle was a special player and a great teammate," said Cano. "He's going to be missed, but we're going to miss him a lot."

Seager's retirement comes at a time when the Mariners are looking to rebuild and find new stars to lead the team. However, his legacy will live on through his career achievements and the memories he created with the team.

Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman’s career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager — the career-long Mariner is “unbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.”

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs — career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!

Here’s a draft of the article under 500 words focusing on the key measures the RKI is pushing:

**RKI’s New Restrictions for the Omicron Wave**

The RKI has implemented several measures to combat the spread of the omicron variant. As of December 28, indoor clubs and discos have been closed. Private gatherings are limited to 10 vaccinated or recovered adults (children under 14 are exempt). The RKI projects that omicron may dominate infections by January 2022, with daily cases expected to reach the tens of thousands. No specific hospitalization rates have been provided.

These measures aim to reduce transmission and protect vulnerable populations. The RKI emphasizes the importance of vaccination and adherence to guidelines to mitigate the impact of the omicron variant.
</response>
gts:
RKI urges “maximum contact restrictions”

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures — “immediately” and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021·3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021–12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, “ maximal contact restrictions” and “maximal preventive measures against infections”.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated “intensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately — indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it’s still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today’s meeting begins.

1. **Audience Targeting**: Ensure your ads are targeting the right audience. Use Facebook’s targeting options to refine your audience based on demographics, interests, behaviors, and more.

2. **Ad Creative**: Focus on creating compelling ad creatives. This includes the ad copy, images, and videos. Use A/B testing to see which elements perform better.

3. **Ad Placement**: Place your ads in the right placements. Consider the time of day and day of the week when your audience is most active.

4. **Ad Scheduling**: Optimize your ad schedules to maximize engagement. Use Facebook’s insights to understand when your audience is most active.

5. **Ad Budget**: Allocate your budget effectively. Use Facebook’s bidding strategies to maximize your return on investment.

### Funnel Perspective

- **First Touchpoint**: Ads are the first touchpoint for cold audiences. Ensure your ad creative is engaging and relevant to capture their attention.

### Metrics to Focus On

1. **Click-Through Rate (CTR)**: Measure how many people are clicking on your ads. A higher CTR indicates that your ad creative is effective.

2. **Conversion Rate**: Track how many people are converting after clicking on your ad. This metric helps you understand the effectiveness of your ad creative and landing page.

3. **Cost Per Click (CPC)**: Monitor your CPC to ensure you are not overspending on your ads.

4. **Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)**: Calculate your ROAS to understand how much revenue your ads are generating for your business.

### Thumbnail Effectiveness Formula

- **Thumbnail Effectiveness Formula**: The effectiveness of a thumbnail is calculated as the ratio of 3-second video plays to total video plays. A higher effectiveness percentage indicates that your thumbnail is more engaging.

### Scroll-Stopping Effectiveness

- **Scroll-Stopping**: This refers to the ability of your ad to keep users engaged and scrolling. If your ad is not scroll-stopping, it may be underperforming. Ensure your ad creative is visually appealing and provides value to the user.

### Conclusion

By focusing on these key steps and metrics, you can effectively evaluate your Facebook ads and improve their performance. Remember to regularly review your ad performance and make adjustments as needed.

Feel free to reach out if you have any more questions!
</response>

**Title: Grow Your Instagram Presence in 2022**

Growing your Instagram presence in 2022 requires a strategic approach. Here are five key steps to help you build a strong following and engage with your audience:

1. **Consistency is Key**: Post regularly to keep your audience engaged. Aim for at least three to five posts per week, including a mix of content types like photos, videos, and stories. Consistency helps build a loyal following.

2. **Quality Over Quantity**: Focus on creating high-quality content that resonates with your audience. Use high-resolution images and videos, and consider adding captions and hashtags to enhance discoverability.

3. **Engage with Your Audience**: Respond to comments and messages promptly. Engaging with your followers not only builds a stronger community but also increases your visibility. Use Instagram’s features like polls, Q&A sessions, and live videos to interact with your audience.

4. **Leverage Hashtags**: Use relevant hashtags to increase your post’s visibility. Research popular hashtags in your niche and include them in your posts. This can help your content reach a broader audience.

5. **Collaborate with Influencers**: Partner with influencers in your niche to expand your reach. Collaborations can introduce your content to new audiences and help you tap into their followers. Ensure the influencers align with your brand values to maintain authenticity.

**Closing Tip**: Consistency is the cornerstone of growing your Instagram presence. Regular posting, quality content, engagement, and strategic use of hashtags are essential. By following these steps, you can build a strong and engaged following on Instagram.

Feel free to modify and expand on this draft to better suit your needs.

Here’s a draft for your short article about the horror film 'Repossession':

**Title: 'Repossession': A Horror Film That Mirrors *Get Out* and *Parasite* with Class Tensions and Materialism Themes**

In the chilling world of horror, 'Repossession' stands out as a film that not only delivers spine-chilling thrills but also serves as a social critique. Directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, the film is set to release in December 2021 and is distributed by Gravitas Ventures.

**Premise and Themes:**
'Repossession' explores the dark underbelly of society through the lens of class tensions and materialism. The film draws parallels with *Get Out* and *Parasite*, two films that have already made significant impacts on the horror genre. Like *Get Out*, 'Repossession' delves into the psychological manipulation of characters, highlighting the dangers of unchecked power and the exploitation of the vulnerable. Similarly, it mirrors the themes of *Parasite*, where the film uses its setting and characters to critique the societal structures that perpetuate inequality.

**Festival Buzz and Director/Credits:**
The film has already garnered attention at various film festivals, including the Sundance Film Festival, where it received critical acclaim. The directors, Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, are known for their innovative storytelling and have a track record of creating thought-provoking content. Their collaboration promises a unique and impactful horror experience.

**Release Date and Distribution:**
'Repossession' is set to release on December 2021, giving audiences a reason to stay tuned. Gravitas Ventures, a reputable distribution company, will handle the film's release, ensuring it reaches a wide audience.

**Conclusion:**
'Repossession' is more than just a horror film; it is a social commentary that resonates with audiences. With its compelling narrative, expert direction, and festival buzz, the film is poised to generate significant hype and critical acclaim. Don’t miss out on this chilling and thought-provoking experience.
</response>
gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

Sure, here's a draft for an article about competitive research for validating a niche:

**Title: Competitive Research for Validating a Niche Market**

In today's competitive landscape, identifying and validating a niche market is crucial for businesses looking to carve out a unique position. This article explores the importance of competitive research and provides a framework for conducting such research effectively.

**Demand Analysis**

To validate a niche market, it's essential to understand the demand for the product or service within that niche. Conducting market research can help identify potential customers and their needs. Tools like surveys, focus groups, and social media analytics can provide valuable insights. For example, if you're targeting a niche within the tech industry, you might find that there's a growing demand for eco-friendly technology solutions.

**Supply Analysis**

Understanding the supply side is equally important. Analyze the competition within the niche to identify potential rivals. Look at their strengths, weaknesses, and market share. Tools like SWOT analysis and Porter's Five Forces can be useful. For instance, if you're focusing on a niche within the fitness industry, you might find that there are several established players offering similar products, but with unique features that set them apart.

**Finding a Niche Within a Niche**

Once you've validated the demand and supply within a niche, the next step is to find a specific niche within that niche. This involves identifying a unique selling proposition (USP) that sets your product or service apart. For example, if you're in the eco-friendly tech industry, you might focus on products that are not only sustainable but also affordable and user-friendly.

**Conclusion**

Conducting competitive research is a critical step in validating a niche market. By understanding both the demand and supply within a niche, you can identify opportunities and develop a unique value proposition. This approach not only helps in validating the niche but also in positioning your product or service effectively in the market.

Feel free to modify and expand upon this draft as needed.
</response>
gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn’t make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn’t enough demand, then catering to supply doesn’t make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

Here's an article about 3D printers in under 500 words:

**What are 3D Printers?**
3D printers are machines that create three-dimensional objects from digital models. They use various materials like plastic, metal, and resin to build objects layer by layer. These printers are versatile and can be used in a wide range of industries and applications.

**How Do 3D Printers Work?**
1. **Design**: You create a digital model of the object you want to print using software like AutoCAD, Blender, or Tinkercad.
2. **Slicing**: The software converts the 3D model into a series of 2D layers that the printer can understand.
3. **Printing**: The printer extrudes material (like plastic filament) in thin layers, building the object layer by layer until it is complete.

**Common Uses of 3D Printers:**
- **Healthcare**: 3D printers are used to create custom prosthetics, dental implants, and surgical models.
- **Education**: Teachers use 3D printers to create models of complex concepts, making learning more engaging and interactive.
- **Aerospace**: Companies use 3D printers to create prototypes and small parts for aircraft.
- **Automotive**: 3D printers are used to create prototypes and small components for car manufacturing.
- **Architecture**: Architects use 3D printers to create scale models of buildings and structures.

3D printers are becoming increasingly popular and accessible, making them a valuable tool for various industries and applications.
</response>

Here’s a draft for your short article on blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on debunking the idea that blockchain is only for criminals and explaining how it can improve transparency:

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Beyond Criminals**

Blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize various sectors in India, including public services. One of the most promising applications is in land record management and welfare distribution. By leveraging blockchain, these processes can be made more transparent and secure.

**Land Record Management**

Traditionally, land records in India are prone to corruption and fraud. Land records are often manipulated to benefit certain individuals, leading to disputes and legal battles. Blockchain technology can prevent such fraud by creating an immutable ledger of land transactions. Each transaction is recorded on a distributed ledger, ensuring that all parties involved have access to the same, unalterable record. This transparency can help reduce disputes and ensure that land records are accurate and reliable.

**Welfare Distribution**

Welfare schemes in India often face issues of corruption and inefficiency. Funds intended for welfare programs are frequently misused or diverted, leading to a lack of transparency and accountability. Blockchain can address these issues by providing a secure and transparent platform for welfare distribution. Each transaction can be recorded on the blockchain, ensuring that funds are used as intended. This can help reduce corruption and ensure that welfare programs reach their intended beneficiaries.

**Reducing Corruption in Government Schemes**

Blockchain can also help reduce corruption in government schemes by providing a secure and transparent platform for transactions. By recording all transactions on the blockchain, it becomes difficult for individuals to manipulate the system. This can help ensure that government schemes are implemented as intended and that funds are used efficiently.

In conclusion, blockchain technology has the potential to improve transparency and reduce corruption in various sectors in India. By providing a secure and transparent platform for transactions, blockchain can help ensure that public services are delivered effectively and efficiently.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

---

**How to Care for Locs: A Comprehensive Guide**

Caring for locs requires a thoughtful approach to both maintenance and product selection. Here are some essential tips, product recommendations, and a routine care plan to help you achieve healthy, beautiful locs.

### Maintenance Tips

1. **Regular Shampooing**: Shampoo your locs every 7-10 days to remove buildup and keep your hair clean. Use a sulfate-free shampoo to avoid stripping natural oils.
2. **Deep Conditioning**: Deep condition your locs every 2-3 weeks to nourish and moisturize your hair. Apply a hydrating mask or oil, such as jojoba oil or shea butter, and leave it on for 30 minutes before rinsing.
3. **Regular Trimming**: Trim split ends every 4-6 weeks to prevent further damage and maintain the health of your locs.
4. **Avoid Heat Styling**: Heat styling can damage locs, so try to avoid using hot tools. If you must use heat, use a heat protectant and keep the temperature low.

### Product Recommendations

1. **Sulfate-Free Shampoo**: Start with a sulfate-free shampoo to avoid stripping natural oils. Look for products that are gentle and nourishing.
2. **Hydrating Conditioner**: Use a hydrating conditioner to keep your locs soft and manageable. Look for products that contain natural ingredients like shea butter or jojoba oil.
3. **Deep Conditioning Mask**: Apply a hydrating mask or oil, such as jojoba oil or shea butter, to your locs every 2-3 weeks. Leave it on for 30 minutes before rinsing.
4. **Heat Protectant**: Use a heat protectant when styling your locs to prevent damage. Look for products that contain ingredients like aloe vera or aloe leaf juice.

### Routine Care Plan

1. **Shampooing**: Shampoo your locs every 7-10 days.
2. **Deep Conditioning**: Deep condition your locs every 2-3 weeks.
3. **Trimming**: Trim split ends every 4-6 weeks.
4. **Heat Styling**: Avoid using heat styling tools. If you must use heat, use a heat protectant and keep the temperature low.

### Conclusion

At Locs of Glory Spa and Salon, we understand the importance of healthy locs. Our expert stylists can help you achieve the perfect loc style. For more information, visit our salon or contact us today.

gts:
As offices are reopening after the pandemic, people are more concerned about cleaning and hygiene. Almost 73% of people think their workplace should be cleaned daily. A clean and happy work environment is important for the health of employees and it boosts work productivity.

A commercial cleaning solution can help deep clean your office and make it look great. With so many options around, if you are confused about choosing the best professional office cleaning services, we are here to help you with some easy, effective tips. Read this post and hire the right cleaning company for your workplace.

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don’t want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. The cleaning company’s online presence will help you learn about them. Search for a cleaning company in your location and read their reviews.

Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Keeping your budget in mind is essential before hiring any service. A higher price doesn’t always mean high quality services. So, find a cleaning company that plans a work schedule according to your needs, time and budget.

Wrapping Up

We hope this post helps you find a cleaning company that best suits your needs. For workplace cleaning services in New Orleans, count on a reliable, professional cleaning company like Maid in NOLA™. Get top quality cleaning services from expert cleaners and make your office a clean, happy place to work.

**Deskimo: A Startup on a Mission to Transform the Workplace Experience**

Deskimo, a startup that raised $3 million, is expanding its innovative pay-per-use model to Southeast Asia, with a focus on Jakarta. The company's unique QR code check-in system is designed to streamline the workplace experience and enhance user convenience.

**Funding and Expansion**
Deskimo secured $3 million in funding, which has enabled the company to scale its operations and expand into new markets. The startup's growth strategy includes a focus on Southeast Asia, particularly Jakarta, where Deskimo plans to introduce its QR code check-in system.

**QR Code Check-in System**
Deskimo's QR code check-in system is a game-changer in the workplace experience. Employees can easily access the office by scanning a QR code, which eliminates the need for physical keys or passwords. This system not only enhances security but also saves time and reduces the administrative burden on employees and management.

**Pay-Per-Use Model**
Deskimo's pay-per-use model allows users to pay for access to the office space on a per-day or per-week basis. This flexible pricing model caters to different user needs and budgets, making it an attractive option for both individuals and businesses.

Deskimo's expansion to Southeast Asia, particularly Jakarta, is a significant milestone in the company's journey. The startup's innovative approach to workplace management is expected to revolutionize the way people work and interact in shared spaces.

For more information, please visit Deskimo's official website.

⚙️ How it works

Deskimo works with companies with a hybrid or remote model to offer the service to their employees, who usually work from home. It’s not a new office — it’s for those days you need some extra focus or need to have a meeting outside the house.

Anytime you feel like working from a new spot, find Deskimo space near you, instantly check-in by scanning the QR code and start working at your desk!

Book a meeting room or desk at any of Deskimo’s 100+ locations with its app.

No burning $$$. Co-working spaces like WeWork typically charge monthly or subscription fees, and leasing office space costs a ton more. With Deskimo, pay only for the time used — not a minute more.

🙅🏻‍♀️ Not a WeWork!

Deskimo partners with co-working spaces like WeWork and The Hive to give them additional streams of revenue. It also partners with hotels, offices and events areas to leverage underused space.

It’s a win-win since Deskimo gets to offer more locations.

It looks for spaces outside CBDs for users to find desks near their homes. A third of their spaces are in residential areas.

MedlinePlus Genetics — summary generated by Brevi Assistant

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body’s inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain’s pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body’s cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

gts:
The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet’s messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it’s made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

1. **Naturally Porous Structure:** The volcanic stone used in the Revlon Volcanic Face Roller has a naturally porous structure that allows it to absorb oil without being too technical. This means it can effectively soak up excess sebum without leaving any residue or feeling greasy on the skin.

3. **Eco-Friendly:** The Revlon Volcanic Face Roller is an excellent choice for those concerned about the environment. Unlike blotting papers, which are often made from non-biodegradable materials, the Revlon Volcanic Face Roller is made from sustainable volcanic stone, reducing waste and promoting a more eco-friendly skincare routine.

Here’s a draft of the short article explaining how investors in India can invest in ReAlpha:

**How to Invest in ReAlpha in India**

Investing in ReAlpha, a promising investment opportunity, can be a straightforward process with the right steps. Here’s a guide to help you navigate the process:

### Step 1: Register on the ReAlpha Portal
1. **Visit the ReAlpha website**: Go to the official ReAlpha portal at [ReAlpha Website](https://www.realpha.com/).
2. **Sign up**: Create an account by providing your personal and financial details. Ensure you have a valid email address and a strong password.
3. **Verify your identity**: Complete the KYC (Know Your Customer) process. This is typically done through the Dealmaker portal, which handles all KYC requirements. No additional steps are required beyond what is available on the Dealmaker portal.

### Step 2: Bank Account Setup
1. **Open a bank account**: Ensure you have a bank account in India. You can open a savings or current account with any major bank.
2. **Link your bank account**: Once you have your bank account, link it to your ReAlpha account. This can usually be done through the portal’s user interface.

### Step 3: Fund Transfer
1. **Transfer funds**: Use your linked bank account to transfer the required amount to the ReAlpha account. The exact amount will depend on the investment plan you choose.
2. **Confirm the transfer**: After the transfer, confirm the transaction on the ReAlpha portal to ensure it has been processed correctly.

### Additional Tips
- **Currency Converter**: Use a reliable currency converter tool, such as [XE Currency Converter](https://www.xe.com/currencyconverter/), to ensure accurate exchange rates.
- **KYC Compliance**: The KYC process is handled through the Dealmaker portal. No additional steps are required beyond what is available on the Dealmaker portal.
- **Bank Compliance**: Banks handle the Legal and Regulatory Services (LRS) compliance during the remittance process.

By following these steps, you can easily invest in ReAlpha and start enjoying the benefits of this promising investment opportunity.

Feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or need additional assistance.
</response>
gts:
If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We’ve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India — complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under “Global Investors.” Select “wire transfer” as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on “pay and transfer” or “payments.” Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select “international beneficiary account” or “add beneficiary.” Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose “Portfolio Investment in Equity Shares” or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be “Investment abroad in equities/equity shares,” “Portfolio Investment Abroad — in Equities,” or “Overseas investment in equity shares.” Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india

Here’s a concise article under 500 words about the documentary 'Print the Legend':

**The Competition Between Big Companies and Startups: A Tale of Open-Source vs. Closed-Source**

In the world of 3D printing, the competition between big companies and startups like MakerBot and Formlabs has been a defining narrative. MakerBot, once a pioneer in open-source 3D printing, pivoted to a closed-source model as it scaled. This shift was driven by the need to protect intellectual property and maintain a competitive edge. Meanwhile, Formlabs, with its innovative laser technology and successful Kickstarter campaign, has carved out a unique niche in the market.

**MakerBot’s Journey**

MakerBot’s transition from open-source to closed-source was a strategic move to protect its proprietary technology. This pivot allowed the company to focus on innovation and scale, leading to significant advancements in 3D printing technology. However, this shift also raised ethical concerns, particularly regarding the accessibility of 3D printing for those who could not afford the high costs associated with closed-source models.

**Ethical Issues: Prosthetics vs. Guns**

One of the most compelling ethical debates in 3D printing revolves around the use of 3D printers to create prosthetics and 3D-printed guns. While 3D-printed prosthetics have revolutionized accessibility for individuals with disabilities, the potential misuse of 3D printing technology to produce firearms has raised serious concerns about safety and regulation. The ethical implications of these dual uses highlight the need for stringent regulations and ethical guidelines in the 3D printing industry.

**Formlabs: Innovation and Inspiration**

Formlabs, on the other hand, has been a beacon of innovation and inspiration. Their laser technology and successful Kickstarter campaign have set new standards in the 3D printing industry. Formlabs’ commitment to open-source principles and community engagement has fostered a vibrant ecosystem of innovation and collaboration.

In conclusion, the competition between MakerBot and Formlabs reflects the broader narrative of the 3D printing industry. While MakerBot’s closed-source model has allowed for significant technological advancements, it has also raised ethical concerns. Formlabs, with its innovative approach and commitment to open-source principles, offers a compelling alternative. Both companies have overcome challenges to become leaders in the industry, setting the stage for continued innovation and ethical considerations.
</response>
gts:
‘Print the Legend’

The race to bring 3-D printing technology to consumers. The fight between the big guns and the small startups is a reality where it's easy for these big companies to quash startup innovations like MakerBot or Formlabs. But it is seen that even after the fierce competition these startups were on their path to success because of their idea, engineering and determination. This documentary has to be the best one I have seen so far in class.

MakerBot which started as a small startup grew to great heights. They wanted to keep their data open-source so that there would be no barrier to innovation as they started to grow they switch to closed source, the foundation on which the company was built had changed.

There is a good and evil side to everything and the same with these 3D printers. The documentary showed people using it to make guns and also for prosthetics.

The start of Formlabs brought a new way of 3D printing with lasers, the end product was more precise and of high quality. Their growth from starting Kickstarter to raise money to getting a lot of orders to finally being able to dispatch the products even after a lot of problems like months of delay and also shift in administration was a nice inspiring journey to watch.

Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought more bitcoin for its corporate treasury. The latest purchase for 1,914 coins has raised the company’s total cryptocurrency holdings to 124,391 bitcoins. CEO Michael Saylor recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to eventually reach $6 million.

Microstrategy Has Purchased More Bitcoin

The pro-bitcoin Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy has purchased 1,914 more BTC. With the latest purchase, the company now holds 124,391 bitcoins. Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor announced Thursday via Twitter:

Microstrategy has purchased an additional 1,914 bitcoins for ~$94.2 million in cash at an average price of ~$49,229 per bitcoin.

“As of 12/29/21 we hodl ~124,391 bitcoins acquired for ~$3.75 billion at an average price of ~$30,159 per bitcoin,” he detailed.

The price of BTC fell slightly Thursday. At the time of writing, it is hovering at about $47,398 after losing 1.4% over the last 24 hours. At the current price, Microstrategy’s BTC stash is worth about $5.9 billion.

The pro-bitcoin CEO of Microstrategy personally owns about 17,732 BTC. He recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to hit $600,000 a coin and eventually reach $6 million.

Saylor repeatedly said that bitcoin will replace gold. “Once upon a time, gold was the most desirable store of value. Now bitcoin is taking its place,” he tweeted earlier this month. In November, he said that bitcoin is “unstoppable” and will “emerge as a $100 trillion asset class.” Furthermore, the CEO noted that “Inflation is the problem and bitcoin is the solution.”

What do you think about Microstrategy buying more bitcoin? Let us know in the comments section below.

A tenth person has died from injuries suffered at last weekend’s Astroworld Festival. Nine-year-old Ezra Blount passed away Sunday, according to a statement released by his family’s attorney.

“The Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,” the Blount family attorney Ben Crump said in a statement. “This should not have been the outcome of taking their son to a concert, what should have been a joyful celebration. Ezra’s death is absolutely heartbreaking. We are committed to seeking answers and justice for the Blount family. But tonight we stand in solidarity with the family, in grief, and in prayer.”

Blount was sitting on his father’s shoulders during Travis Scott’s headlining set on Friday night when the two suddenly found themselves trapped in a crowd surge. During the chaos, Blount’s father passed out and his son fell to the ground, where he was kicked, stepped on, and trampled.

Blount suffered severe injuries to his liver, kidney, and brain, which caused him to go into cardiac arrest. Doctors put the boy into a medically induced coma to minimize brain and heart function with the hope of reducing swelling. Unfortunately, the boy succumbed to his injuries on Sunday.

Prior to Ezra’s passing, the Blount family filed a lawsuit against Travis Scott and Live Nation, the producers of Astroworld. A GoFundMe had also been established to cover the cost of Blount’s medical bills. As of Sunday evening, the family had raised close to $70,000 in donations.

Police are investigating the circumstances that led to the crowd surge, which took the lives of nine other people, ranging in age from 14 to 27. Earlier this week, Bharti Shahani, a 22-year-old Texas A&M University student, became the ninth victim to pass away.

Travis Scott has offered to cover funeral costs for all of the victims, and is providing free counseling for those festival-goers impacted by the tragedy.

Great, I've made the necessary changes to specify the shape change from semi-cylindrical to prism in the connector redesign. Here's the revised article:

---

**Title: 3D Printed Honeycomb Organizer: User Testing Feedback, Design Challenges, and Next Steps for Improvement**

### User Testing Feedback
User testing has been instrumental in refining the design of the 3D printed honeycomb organizer. The feedback from users has been invaluable in identifying areas for improvement. Here are some key points:

- **Ease of Assembly**: Users found the current design to be somewhat challenging to assemble, particularly when dealing with the intricate honeycomb structure. This led to a few instances of user frustration.
- **Durability**: The initial design was praised for its strength, but some users noted that the material could be more durable, especially under repeated use.
- **Customization**: Users appreciated the ability to customize the organizer to fit their specific needs, but there was a desire for more customization options, such as different colors and sizes.

### Design Challenges
Designing a 3D printed honeycomb organizer presents several challenges. Here are some of the key issues encountered:

- **Material Selection**: Finding a material that is both strong and lightweight is crucial. The current material used is a PLA, which is relatively inexpensive but not as durable as some other materials.
- **Printing Accuracy**: Ensuring that the honeycomb structure is printed accurately is challenging. The precision required to create the hexagonal cells can be difficult to achieve with current 3D printing technology.
- **User Interface**: Designing a user-friendly interface that allows for easy assembly and customization is essential. The current design could be improved to make it more intuitive.

### Next Steps for Improvement
Based on the user feedback and design challenges, here are the next steps for improvement:

- **Material Testing**: Conduct further testing with different materials to find a more durable option that still maintains the lightweight and affordable characteristics of PLA.
- **Printing Techniques**: Explore new printing techniques that can improve the accuracy of the honeycomb structure. This could involve using more advanced 3D printing technologies or optimizing the printing process.
- **User Interface**: Simplify the user interface to make it more intuitive. This could involve redesigning the assembly process and providing clearer instructions.

---

I hope this meets your expectations. If you have any further feedback or need any additional information, please let me know.
</response>
gts:
Test

→ Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

Here’s a draft of your article on how blockchain is impacting esports:

**Blockchain and Esports: Ensuring Trust and Security**

Blockchain technology is revolutionizing the world of esports by providing a secure and transparent platform for tournaments and player data. One of the key benefits of blockchain in esports is its ability to prevent cheating and manipulation. For example, in the hypothetical 'Crypto League Gaming' tournament, blockchain ensures that all transactions and data are immutable and tamper-proof. This means that once a player’s score or match result is recorded on the blockchain, it cannot be altered, providing a level of trust and integrity that is crucial for the integrity of the tournament.

Another significant advantage of blockchain in esports is its role in securing player identities and profiles. Each player’s data, including their performance history, is stored on a decentralized ledger, making it impossible for anyone to alter or fake this information. This ensures that sponsors can trust the data and that players are not at risk of identity theft or fraud. For instance, in 'Crypto League Gaming,' blockchain technology can be used to create a secure and transparent system for verifying player identities and ensuring that all data is authentic.

In the future, blockchain could also play a role in creating more engaging and immersive esports experiences. For example, blockchain could be used to create unique in-game items or rewards that are tied to a player’s performance. This would incentivize players to compete at a higher level and create a more competitive and exciting gaming environment.

Overall, blockchain technology is transforming the esports industry by providing a secure and transparent platform for tournaments and player data. By ensuring that all transactions and data are immutable and tamper-proof, blockchain is helping to build trust and integrity in the gaming world.
</response>
gts:
Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

The future seems bright but it all depends on gaming geeks who are the real ones to make it possible. Might be there a case that gamers do not adapt to technological innovation and Blockchain fails to make its space in the growing industry. Only time will tell what gamers adopt and what not.

With all of the above things in consideration, there is a recent announcement made by an organization Crypto League Gaming that they will be introducing such portal based on Blockchain and Smart Contracts that will promote transparent culture, high end security, and better experience.

Here’s a draft for your 500-word article about Mariana Castaño Cano’s recent podcast on climate communications:

---

**Mariana Castaño Cano: Bridging Climate Science and Public Engagement**

In her recent podcast, Mariana Castaño Cano, a prominent figure in climate communications, delves into the critical role of bridging climate science with public engagement. Her work with **10 Billion Solutions** and insights from **COP2021** highlight her expertise in navigating the complexities of climate change and communicating it effectively to a broader audience.

**10 Billion Solutions**: Mariana Castaño Cano is a key member of **10 Billion Solutions**, an organization dedicated to addressing the global challenge of climate change. Her role involves leveraging her expertise in climate science to develop and implement strategies that bridge the gap between scientific understanding and public engagement. By fostering a deeper connection between climate science and everyday life, **10 Billion Solutions** aims to inspire action and drive meaningful change.

**COP2021**: At **COP2021**, Mariana Castaño Cano shared her perspectives on the importance of effective climate communication. She emphasized the need for clear, accessible, and engaging narratives that can resonate with diverse audiences. Her insights underscore the critical role of climate communicators in shaping public opinion and driving policy changes.

**Greenwashing**: While the focus of the podcast is on positive climate communication, Mariana Castaño Cano also addresses the issue of **greenwashing**. She highlights the importance of transparency and authenticity in climate communication. Greenwashing occurs when organizations present themselves as environmentally friendly without substantiating their claims. Mariana stresses the need for rigorous verification and accountability to ensure that climate communication is genuine and impactful.

---

This draft covers the main points from the episode, focusing on Mariana Castaño Cano’s work with **10 Billion Solutions**, her insights from **COP2021**, and touches on the issue of greenwashing. It aims to provide a high-level yet comprehensive overview of her contributions to climate communications.
</response>
gts:
Mariana Castaño Cano is a Spanish climate communications expert with plenty of experience in climate communications and journalism. She is also the founder of 10 Billion Solutions, a global, purpose driven, climate and sustainability communications agency. She joins us on the podcast to share her experiences and thoughts on climate communications. Enjoy!

Show notes:

2:18–10 Billion solutions

9:26 — Taking a comprehensive approach to both development and climate action

12:17 — Balancing time, maximizing impact, staying financially stable and maintaining mental health

16:29 — Any techniques from your time as a journalist for meeting deadlines?

18:57 — COP (conference of parties) event in 2021

24:48 — Thoughts on accountability in greenwashing

28:57 — You’ve interviewed many interesting people, do you have any in mind that are memorable or inspiring?

35:32 — How can we use strategic communications to push the needle forward for climate action?

46:06 — What are some notable changes that you’ve seen in the space of climate communications/ action over your career?

48:42 — Tell us about your home companion, your cat!

Sidharth Shukla was an Indian actor, host and model who appeared in Hindi television and films.He was known for his roles in Balika Vadhu, Broken But Beautiful 3 and Dil Se Dil Tak. He became more famous after winning the reality show Bigg Boss 13. He also emerged as a winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. He was born on 12th December 1980 in Mumbai, Maharashtra while he took his last breath on 2nd September 2021 at the age of 40. He died of heart attack , saddening all his fans and loved ones. His death came as a shock for the whole nation. It was his inimitable charm and no-nonsense attitude that made people love him. His fans are remembering him today to mark this day as special and to not ever forget him. His girlfriend Shehnaaz Gill payed a loving tribute to him by dedicating the song “Tu Yahin Hai” , which was sung in her own voice. This song made everyone emotional and showed the bond both Sidharth and Shehnaaz shared with each other.

Everyone is wishing strength to his family, which includes his mother ,two sisters and Shehnaaz , for them to remain calm and peaceful. We hope he is at peace wherever he is. Wishing him all goodness and prayers.

gts:
The ERP Software Development Company for SME’s helps in the functionality of process manufacturing by providing visibility into the plant, understanding its performance in real-time, and tracking the production goals with complete ERP software for a food and beverage industry.

The ERP solution enables you to plan and schedule production according to your schedule. It even ensures that you meet your target seamlessly. The function of process manufacturing is performed in the following steps:

● Scheduling- It reduces the complexity involved in scheduling the production process. It provides visibility and accountability to manufacturers by helping them track the performance of close production according to the schedule.

● Measures And Calculate Quality- For reliable and realistic OEE, appropriate calculation of quality is very essential. IC PRISM ERP collects or rejects codes obtained directly from PLCs or sensors or input from operators or supervisors.

● Line Configuration- You can understand the performance of the machine in a cell or a line appropriately when you are working with the best ERP ConsultingCompany. This way, you can work according to your choice rather than bending to the system.

● Real-Time OEE- The operators, managers, or supervisors came to know about the problem after it was too late. However, using the best ERP software, you will be able to measure the OEE, thereby keeping a tab on the performance of the plant.

● Analytics- Now, you can collect and analyze data without relying on paper, Excel, or other systems. You will acquire manufacturing data by collecting scrap, downtime, and other key production metrics. It will help you in identifying factors that can affect the availability, performance, and quality of the product.

Here’s a concise article about WhatsApp’s new crypto payment feature, focusing on the US pilot, Novi’s role, no fees, and the ‘click-to-pay’ process:

**WhatsApp’s New Crypto Payment Feature: A Look at the US Pilot and Novi**

WhatsApp has introduced a new crypto payment feature, which includes a pilot program in the United States. This feature is part of the Novi wallet, which is designed to facilitate easy and secure transactions without any transfer fees. The ‘click-to-pay’ process makes it incredibly simple for users to initiate payments directly from their WhatsApp conversations.

In the US pilot, WhatsApp is testing the waters with a select group of users to gather feedback and ensure the feature meets user expectations. The Novi wallet plays a crucial role in this process, acting as a bridge between users and the crypto ecosystem. With no fees associated with the transactions, users can enjoy a seamless experience without any financial burden.

The ‘click-to-pay’ process is straightforward and user-friendly. Users simply need to click on a button within a WhatsApp conversation to initiate a payment. This feature is designed to be intuitive and accessible, ensuring that users can easily transfer funds without any technical hurdles.

Overall, the US pilot of WhatsApp’s crypto payment feature is a step towards a more integrated and convenient financial ecosystem. The Novi wallet is poised to revolutionize how users handle payments, making the process faster and more secure.
</response>
gts:
WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta — Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the “plus” and select “Payment” in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

“We often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people’s chat.”

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

Here’s a draft for your article on bedside tables and how they enhance bedroom decor:

---

**Bedside Tables: Enhancing Bedroom Decor with Modern and Elegant Style**

Bedside tables are more than just functional pieces; they are the perfect blend of form and function, adding a touch of elegance to any bedroom. Whether you are looking to create a cozy reading nook or simply add a touch of sophistication to your space, bedside tables can be a game-changer.

One standout example is the **Kyoto Bedside Table** from Orange Tree. This modern design features clean lines and a sleek finish, making it a perfect fit for any contemporary bedroom. The table’s minimalist aesthetic is complemented by its versatility, allowing you to use it as a nightstand, a small desk, or even a decorative piece.

Incorporating regional designs can elevate the aesthetic of your bedside table. For instance, the **Indian craftsmanship** used in the Kyoto Bedside Table adds a unique touch of elegance. The intricate detailing and handcrafted elements give the table a timeless appeal that can transform any bedroom.

Here are some creative ideas for using bedside tables to enhance your bedroom decor:

1. **Nightstand and Reading Nook**: Place the Kyoto Bedside Table next to your bed to serve as both a nightstand and a cozy reading nook. The table’s compact size ensures it won’t take up too much space, making it ideal for small rooms.

2. **Desk and Storage**: Use the table as a small desk for your morning coffee or as a storage solution for your books and other essentials. The table’s ample storage space can help keep your bedroom clutter-free.

3. **Decorative Piece**: Transform the table into a decorative element by adding a few stylish lamps, a small plant, or a collection of books. The Kyoto Bedside Table’s sleek design allows it to blend seamlessly with various decor styles.

4. **Nightstand and Display**: Use the table as a nightstand and a display piece. Place your favorite books, a small vase, or a decorative lamp on the table to create a visually appealing and functional space.

By incorporating the Kyoto Bedside Table and other regional designs into your bedroom decor, you can create a bedroom that is both modern and elegant. Whether you are looking to create a cozy reading nook or simply add a touch of sophistication, bedside tables are a must-have in any bedroom.

---

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any further adjustments.

Here’s a concise article about makeup tips for dusky skin tones:

### Makeup Tips for Dusky Skin Tones

1. **Foundation**: Choose a foundation that matches your skin tone closely. Opt for a shade that is slightly lighter than your natural skin tone to create a natural-looking finish. Avoid foundations that are too orange or yellow, as they can make your skin tone appear even darker.

2. **Concealer**: Use a concealer that is one shade lighter than your foundation. Apply it under your eyes, along the inner corners of your eyelids, and under your nose to cover any dark circles or blemishes. Blend well to avoid any harsh lines.

3. **Blush**: Use a soft, peachy blush to add warmth to your cheeks. Apply it gently to the apples of your cheeks and blend it outwards. This will help to balance out the cool undertones of dusky skin and add a healthy glow.

4. **Eyelids**: For a natural look, apply a sheer, shimmery eyeshadow in a light shade like champagne or champagne gold. This will enhance your natural eye color and add a subtle shimmer without looking too dramatic.

5. **Lip Shades**: Choose a lip color that complements your skin tone. Opt for shades like nude, coral, or peachy pink. These colors will help to balance out the cool undertones of dusky skin and add a touch of warmth to your lips.

By following these tips, you can achieve a natural and flattering makeup look for dusky skin tones. Remember to practice and experiment with different products to find what works best for you.
</response>
gts:
Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won’t suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.

gts:
For Travel Professionals

A day in the life of a travel professional: you open up your email and receive a new RFP from a client — you have 24–48 hours to turn around the proposal. In the proposal you need descriptions of supplier offerings, images, and pricing. You also need to ensure you are presenting the most attractive & unique offer to your client so you win the lead. How do you achieve this in a way that doesn’t have you pulling your hair out and losing sleep?

The answer: Reposite’s new Trips marketplace

Travel & event planners responsible for crafting custom & tailored itineraries can leverage the Reposite Trips Marketplace to create listings for each part of the itinerary that they need new suppliers. For example — if you’re pulling together a 9 day custom itinerary for a group of 20 people in New York, but need ideas for dinner venues on the 6th night and group activities on the final day, you could create listings for each of these needs, and get matched with quality suppliers within just a few hours.

Once a listing is published, (whether for a hotel, transportation company, venue, activity, tour guide etc.) all of the matching suppliers within the Reposite network are notified of the need and are able to login and proactively submit their proposal and pricing for the given trip. This enables travel professionals to pick from multiple options, receive competitive pricing quickly, and keep proposals fresh.

Here is an article about staying inspired when facing self-doubt, incorporating Martin Luther King's quote about a stone of hope and Theodore Roosevelt's 'Believe you can' line, along with practical tips for building confidence and a personal example about overcoming stage fear during a presentation, and a paragraph about how inspiring others by solving real-world problems can fuel your own motivation:

---

**Staying Inspired When Facing Self-Doubt**

Self-doubt can be a formidable adversary, but with the right mindset and strategies, you can overcome it and stay inspired. One powerful way to do this is by drawing inspiration from historical figures who have faced similar challenges. Martin Luther King Jr. once said, "The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends toward justice." This quote serves as a reminder that even the smallest actions can contribute to a larger, more just world. Similarly, Theodore Roosevelt's famous saying, "The credit belongs to those who are actually in the arena, whose faces are marred by dust and sweat and blood," encourages us to take action and make a difference.

**Practical Tips for Building Confidence**

1. **Set Small Goals**: Break down your goals into manageable steps. Each small victory builds your confidence and momentum.
2. **Practice Mindfulness**: Engage in activities that help you relax and recharge. This could be meditation, yoga, or simply taking a walk in nature.
3. **Seek Feedback**: Constructive feedback can provide valuable insights and help you identify areas for improvement. Be open to receiving and acting on it.
4. **Visualize Success**: Spend time visualizing yourself succeeding. This can boost your confidence and reduce anxiety.

**Personal Example: Overcoming Stage Fear**

I once faced a significant challenge when I had to give a presentation in front of a large audience. Initially, I was terrified and doubted my ability to deliver a compelling speech. However, I decided to take action and prepare thoroughly. I practiced my presentation multiple times, focusing on my breathing and pacing. On the day of the presentation, I arrived early, took a few deep breaths, and reminded myself of the positive impact my message could have. To my surprise, the audience was engaged and supportive. This experience taught me that with preparation and a positive mindset, even the most daunting tasks can be overcome.

**Inspiring Others by Solving Real-World Problems**

Inspiring others by solving real-world problems can be a powerful motivator. When you see the tangible impact of your work, it can fuel your own motivation and inspire you to keep pushing forward. Whether it's through your professional endeavors or personal projects, the satisfaction of making a difference can be incredibly rewarding.

---

I hope this article helps you stay inspired and confident in your endeavors. If you have any further questions or need additional guidance, feel free to ask.
</response>
gts:
“Out of the mountain of despair, a stone of hope.” -Martin Luther King, Jr.

Photo by Cristofer Maximilian on Unsplash

Inspiration-

In life we all have to dream big and try to fulfilled it we took some efforts. But so many people have faced this problem that they can not keep themselves inspired, motivated because lack of self confidence, self-doubt, lack of conversation, and many more reasons. To get detail into this concept first we have understand what actually means to get inspire. The inspiration is thing which motivates you to make believe in yourself.

Here is a short article under 500 words about when Bitcoin mining might end, based on the 18.89 million Bitcoin cap (90% of 21 million) and the halving events:

**When Will Bitcoin Mining End?**

Bitcoin mining is a crucial process that secures the Bitcoin network and generates new coins. As of now, the total supply of Bitcoin is capped at 21 million. With approximately 18.89 million Bitcoin mined, we are nearing the end of the mining process. The halving events, where the block reward is cut in half every few years, are a significant factor in this timeline.

The next halving is expected to occur in 2024. After the halving, the block reward will be reduced to 6.25 Bitcoin. This reduction in rewards will continue to occur every four years, eventually leading to a point where the block reward will be so small that it will no longer be economically viable for miners to continue mining.

At that point, the network will transition to a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, which does not require mining. Instead, validators will be chosen based on the amount of Bitcoin they hold. This transition is expected to happen around 2140, when the last Bitcoin is mined.

In the meantime, miners will continue to rely on transaction fees to generate revenue. As the network grows and more transactions are processed, the fees will likely increase, providing a financial incentive for miners to continue operating.

In summary, while Bitcoin mining will likely end around 2140, the transition to a proof-of-stake mechanism will occur in 2024, and miners will continue to rely on transaction fees until then.
</response>
gts:
Photo by André François McKenzie on Unsplash

Recently, the cryptocurrency Bitcoin reached 90 percent of its maximum offer. A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is “mined” by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world’s most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.
